      • getSituationLayout

        @GetMapping(value="/getMap")
public JsonMessage getSituationLayout()
                                                             throws TraciException,
                                                                    NoIntersectionInSituationException,
                                                                    NoValidRoutesInSituationException
        Retrieves current infrastructure layout
        Returns:
        json object with infrastructure layout
        Throws:
        TraciException - when some of the traci calls fails
        NoIntersectionInSituationException - when there are no intersections present in infrastructure
        NoValidRoutesInSituationException - when there are no valid routes present in infrastructure

        SumoNetworkGenerationException - when generation of configuration files fails
        InfrastructureElementNotFoundException - when some element of infrastructure is missing

      • laneOperation

        @GetMapping(value="/laneOperation")
public JsonMessage laneOperation(@RequestParam
                                                                      java.lang.String legId,
                                                                      @RequestParam
                                                                      int intersectionId,
                                                                      @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                      java.lang.Boolean left,
                                                                      @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                      java.lang.Boolean straight,
                                                                      @RequestParam(required=false)
                                                                      java.lang.Boolean right,
                                                                      @RequestParam
                                                                      java.lang.String laneId,
                                                                      @RequestParam
                                                                      java.lang.String operation)
                                                               throws SumoNetworkGenerationException,
                                                                      LaneOperationException,
                                                                      InfrastructureElementNotFoundException
        Handles lane operations: add, delete, change TODO: split
        Parameters:
        legId - id of a leg where we want to put the lane
        intersectionId - id of a intersection where we want to put the lane
        left - direction
        straight - direction
        right - direction
        laneId - id of a lane to be changed or deleted
        operation - lane operation
        Returns:
        generic json message object
        Throws:
        SumoNetworkGenerationException - when generation of configuration files fails
        LaneOperationException - when lane operation itself encounters error
        InfrastructureElementNotFoundException - when some element of infrastructure is missing

      • addIntersection

        @PostMapping(value="/sendConfiguration")
public JsonMessage addIntersection(@RequestBody
                                                                             JsonRecievedConf request)
                                                                      throws NoVehicleTypesForSimulation,
                                                                             UnknownDirection,
                                                                             OccupiedGridPositionException,
                                                                             SumoNetworkGenerationException,
                                                                             NoXmlStringProvidedException,
                                                                             XMLElementNotFoundException,
                                                                             XMLElementInvalidValueException,
                                                                             InfrastructureElementNotFoundException
        Adds new intersection to traffic infrastructure
        Parameters:
        request - json object with the request
        Returns:
        generic json message
        Throws:
        NoVehicleTypesForSimulation - when no vehycle types were selected
        UnknownDirection - when invalid direction was selected
        OccupiedGridPositionException - when the position to put intersection is occupied
        SumoNetworkGenerationException - when the configuration files generation fails
        NoXmlStringProvidedException - when the configuration was empty
        XMLElementNotFoundException - when some of the essential xml elements was not found in configuration
        XMLElementInvalidValueException - when some of the xml elements has invalid value
        InfrastructureElementNotFoundException - when some of the infrastructure elements is missing

      • handleException

        @ExceptionHandler(value=java.lang.Exception.class)
public JsonMessage handleException(java.lang.Exception exception)
        Handles exception from all the requests handlers
        Parameters:
        exception - to be processed
        Returns:
        general json message with error
